titleStmt.title: A copy of a letter written to an officer of the Army by a true Commonwealths-man, and no courtier, concerning the right and settlement of our present government and governors.
titleStmt.author: True Commonwealths-man.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Newcomb, over against Bainards-Castle in Thames-street.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
